attributes.action: Reverse the decision to deport the Ghanaian women who needs dialysis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned feel thedeportation is a national disgrace and an inhumane act on behalf of the Immigration Department of this country.  This person was not even an illegal immigrant, she was here ligitimately and outstayed her original visa.  Why, in the circumstances of her illness, this original visa was extended until she was well enough to return to her homeland is bureaucracy gone mad and we advocate a reversal of the decision to deport her to end her suffering and before she dies.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
